text: All the individual parts were crazy, but somehow the whole thing seemed to make sense in the moment, at least.
Obama kept a seriously inquisitive look on his face the whole time, like all Kanye's music.
It seemed crazy at first but before long I was nodding along as if it made complete sense.
Eventually he had to take a breath and Obama jumped in.
You make uhh some really good points, especially about the value of meeting with smart people like Elon Musk.
Thank you everyone for your support for the DNC."
